Home Extension Slider,home-extension-slider,"<div class=""home-fullwidth-block above-margin below-margin"">
This Magento 2 extension will display the most viewed products on your website to make it easy for your customer in selecting the best products.
This Magento 2 extension will help you to start getting notifications regarding your repeat customers. Treat them better every time when they purchase any product from your store.
This Magento 2 extension will help you to process index management from backend panel. It will automatically update or re-index if any data changes.
This Magento 2 extension helps admin to start getting notifications regarding new order. It will save your time through emails to check new orders without logging in to your site.
This Magento 2 extension will replace the default Magento search functionality with custom search engine powered by Google.
This Magento 2 extension will provide the ideal option for placing best selling products anywhere on your store.
